title: Mobile Website Design Competency Enhancement Program for Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational HTML/CSS skills and comprehension of basic web design principles
context.additional_context: Emphasizes practical design skills applicable to work for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can create responsive web layouts optimized for smartphone screen sizes using three or more techniques.
Learners can collaboratively plan and develop mobile website prototypes based on user experience (UX) principles.
Learners can implement device-specific responsive designs using CSS media queries and flexible box models.
Learners can produce mobile pages compliant with web accessibility guidelines (WCAG) through practical projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
